Qualification.name: IPB University
Qualification.address: Jl. Kumbang No.14, RT.02/RW.06, Babakan, Kecamatan Bogor Tengah, Kota Bogor, Jawa Barat 16128
Qualification.description:
IPB University, or the Institut Pertanian Bogor, was founded in 1963, as a state-run agricultural university with the aim of strengthening food security, promoting bioenergy, protecting the regional environment and alleviating poverty. It is the only state university with a focus on tropical agriculture and life sciences â€“ and is world-renowned in this field.


Based in the city of Bogor, Indonesia, it is approximately 60km from the capital city, Jakarta. IPB University comprises five campuses: Baranangsiang, Dramaga, Gunung Gede, Cilibende and Taman Kencana. There is a research centre, university farm, animal hospital, student dormitory and library.

Qualification.name: National Civil Service Agency (Intern)
Qualification.address: Jl. Mayor Jendral Sutoyo No.12, RT.4/RW.14, Cililitan, Kec. Kramat jati, Kota Jakarta Timur, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 13640
Qualification.description: National Civil Service Agency, is an Indonesian non-ministerial government agency tasked with carrying out government duties in the field of state personnel management.

Qualification.name: PT. Rynest Technology Indomedia
Qualification.address: Jl. Tole Iskandar No.11, Sukmajaya, Kec. Sukmajaya, Kota Depok, Jawa Barat 16412
Qualification.description:
PT. Rynest Technology Indomedia is a company engaged in Information Technology with the characteristics of services that are innovative, creative, and modern. RTI was founded in 2009 as well as under the auspices of The Rynest Companies Group (RCG) business unit.
With the support of competent and professional and experienced human resources so that the quality of products and services provided by RTI can always meet the needs of its customers, especially for information technology services in the fields of insurance, pension funds, and finance.

Study_case.name: Staycation
Study_case.short_desc: The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to develop a web-based application, as the basis for learning the MERN Stack.
Study_case.description:
The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to develop a web-based application, as the basis for learning the MERN Stack. MERN Stack is part of the Full-Stack Web Developer which is focused on JavaScript (Full-Stack JavaScript Developer). M for MongoDB, E for ExpressJS, R for ReactJS, and N for NodeJS. But it's not just coding, but things that are learned from the UI and UX sections.

The result of this course is a web-based application called staycation, which is a website that serves users in terms of finding a place to vacation. (buildwithangga.com)

Study_case.name: Luxspace
Study_case.short_desc: The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use React JS.
Study_case.description:
The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use React JS. React JS is a JavaScript framework that is used by Front-End developers to build interactive and high-performance websites.

The result of this course is a web-based application called luxspace, which is a case study of an online furniture store. (buildwithangga.com)

Study_case.name: Crowdfunding
Study_case.short_desc: The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use Golang & Vue JS.
Study_case.description:
The course from the website buildwithangga.com is to build web-based applications, as a basis for learning to use Golang & Vue JS. Vue JS is a Front-End framework used by Web Developers to build fast, light, and interactive websites. Golang is also often used as a programming language to build APIs that are consumed by Front-End.

The result of this course is a web-based application called Crowdfunding. Crowdfunding is a case study to raise funds for startups. (buildwithangga.com)

Project.name: Qonstanta
Project.short_desc: Qonstanta is an online-based learning system with the concept of Edu Live Class.
Project.description: Qonstanta is an online-based learning system with the concept of Edu Live Class. Students will be guided online in the form of Live Class, Learning Videos, Question, Teaching Materials and Practice Questions, Tips and Tricks, Student Online Consultations, Student Periodic Reports, Chat Rooms, School and College Info, and Online Try Out. (Qonstanta)

Project.name: Internsip App
Project.short_desc: The Internship Application is a program of Badan Kepegawain Negara Information System.
Project.description: The Internship Application is a program of Badan Kepegawain Negara Information System in providing facilities for students to develop the academic potential that has been learned while at school or on campus with experience working in Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN).
